jd: From: Payal Shrivastava, Tek Inspirations LLC payal.shrivastava@tekinspirations.com Reply to: payal.shrivastava@tekinspirations.com Job Title :- CMS Business AnalystLocation:- Quincy, MA/Hybrid.Duration:- 6 Months with a possible extensionInterview Mode :- In-Person Interview Local Only from MA, NH or RI and must have recent client experience from these locationsMust Have Benefits and Eligibility experience Hybrid 2-3 days onsite every weekWorks Hours paid – 37.5 Hrs Client Job Description · 4-5 years of IT applications experience as a Business Analyst· At least 2 years of experience supporting a benefits management program’s eligibility management processes· Demonstrated understanding of complex information workflows through a Content Management Solution to publish sensitive information· Demonstrated ability to analyze and synthesize business requirements· Demonstrated ability to understand and negotiate the needs and expectations of multiple stakeholders.· Excellent communication & negotiation skills and experience in supporting technical and non-technical staff· Strong background in developing trust and confidence in relationships with stakeholders and cross-functional teams; experience coordinating and fulfilling requests for internal/external changes· Demonstrated expertise in information systems, business operations, requirements analysis, and integration/design of solutions.· The candidate must be process-oriented with sound judgment, attention to detail, accuracy, and follow-through including flexibility to perform in an Regards, Payal ShrivastavaIT RecruiterTEK Inspirations LLC : 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035Email: payal.shrivastava@tekinspirations.com
